exceptions.exn: In environment x : R P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Rbar_opp ?M2363 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (- x) eps y -> (fun x0 : R => (fun u : R => u < - x) x0 -> P x0) y".
